products.title: Galaxy Note 10
products.name: Samsung Galaxy Note 10
products.summary:
Screen: The power phone in a beautifully balanced, compact design.

Battery life: 3,500mAh battery with 25W super charging technology gives you more then enough power to get you through the day.

Camera: Triple rear camera gives you the power to create like a pro.

Special feature: Rewrite how you use your phone with a powerful S Pen.
fieldItems:
Rewrite how you use your phone

Screen

Samsung Note10 packs all the power of a smartphone into the palm of your hand with a beautifully balanced, compact design. Its stunning 6.3 inch Infinity-O Display lets you see every detail in everything you watch. Boxsets burst from the screen in rich, vivid colour and every memory you capture is sharper than ever. With its minimal bezels, Da Vinci 1 gives you more space to multitask—a compact design for big ideas.

Camera

Whether you’re into creating content or just want to capture every memory, Galaxy Notr10's stunning camera has a lens for every occasion. Shoot video like a pro to create content like never before, pick out and enhance certain sounds and keep everything super smooth and steady. And when it comes to pro-level editing, Adobe Rush1 gives you an on-the-go editing suite at your fingertips.

S Pen

Rewrite how you use your phone with Galaxy Note10’s innovative S Pen. As well as sketching out designs and jotting down notes, our latest S Pen gives you the power to control your camera. Switch between the front and rear cameras, zoom in or out and snap a group selfie, all with the click of a pen. You can even use the S Pen to make every slideshow seamless.

Battery

The rnaxirnized New Infinity Display is near bezel-less, no notches, and no distractions. Galaxy A80's 6.7" Full HD+ Super AMOLED offers a big and bright canvas to explore content, stories, connections, and creativity. Now there's more room to play.

products.title: Galaxy Note 10 Plus
products.name: Samsung Galaxy Note 10 Plus
products.summary:
Screen: Experience more of what you love on an immersive 6.8 inch WQHD+ cinematic screen.

Processor: Put the power of a computer in your pocket with the Exynos 9825 Processor.

Camera: Quad rear camera gives you the power to create like a pro.

Special feature: Rewrite how you use your phone with a powerful S Pen.
fieldItems:
Rewrite how you use your phone

Screen

Go big with Galaxy Note10+. The 6.8 inch Infinity-O Display is our biggest to date—a powerfully immersive, cinematic experience in your hand. With a split screen, it lets you lose yourself in a movie on your commute while scrolling through your social feed. With a beautiful balance of polished metal, minimal bezels and subtle curves, Galaxy Note10+ gives you more screen and less interruptions. Work and play in a whole new way.

Camera

Galaxy Note 10+ is for the creators. It's our ultimate smartphone for creating content or capturing every memory. Its camera has a lens for every occasion. Shoot video like a pro to create content like never before. Blur backgrounds to focus on what you want, pick out and enhance certain sounds and keep everything super smooth and steady. Galaxy Note 10+’s camera is even smart enough to judge depth and distance, capturing and measuring everything in amazing detail.

Processor

Put the power of a computer in your pocket. With our fastest processor yet and its intelligent battery, Galaxy Note10+ has what it takes to keep you going through your most demanding days. It learns your routine and only uses battery life when you need it. And with a mind-blowing level of storage, Galaxy Note10+ is 1TB ready, so you have the space to keep everything you care about.

S Pen

Rewrite how you use your phone with Galaxy Note 10+’s innovative S Pen. As well as sketching out designs and jotting down notes, our latest S Pen gives you the power to control your camera. Switch between the front and rear cameras, zoom in or out and snap a group selfie, all with the click of a pen. You can even use the S Pen to make every slideshow seamless. And if Galaxy Note 10+’s massive Infinity-O Display still isn’t big enough, with DeX you can simply connect it to a monitor and use a keyboard or mouse for a PC-like experience that helps you work wonders

products.title: Galaxy A80
products.name: Samsung Galaxy A80
products.summary:
Screen: Large 6.7 FHD+ Super AMOLED is going to be as much as you ever need in a screen.

Battery life: 3700mAh battery with 25W super charging technology gives you more then enough power to get you through the day.

Camera: 8MP ultra wide camera, 48MP main camera and 3D cameras to capture all your moments.

Special feature: The triple camera slides and rotates to catch what's happening in front and behind.
fieldItems:
Built for the era of Live

The Galaxy A80 changes how you document life. The triple camera slides and rotates to catch what's happening in front and behind. Therefore, now you have one camera that shoots on both sides to capture all your moments 

Shoot Live videos like a pro

Galaxy A80 records like a pro-level action camera utilizing the Ultra Wide Camera and predictive software. Super steady gives you srnooth live videos, even when your journey is on the adventurous side.

Measure anything instantly

Whether you're looking to add new furniture to your home or check the size of your space, it's easy to get real-time AR rneasurements. With the pre-loaded Quick Measure app, simply scan and measure distances, lengths, depths, and space of 3D objects.

The display designed for Live

The rnaxirnized New Infinity Display is near bezel-less, no notches, and no distractions. Galaxy A80's 6.7" Full HD+ Super AMOLED offers a big and bright canvas to explore content, stories, connections, and creativity. Now there's more room to play.

Share, stream, and play faster

Galaxy A80 is the phone that's up for the challenge. The Intelligent Performance Enhancer recognizes your mobile habits and optimizes the powerful Octa-Core Processor and 8GB of RAM so you can stream, game, and use your phone with incredibly high performance.

Privacy at every layer

Built into the phone's hardware and software from the start, Samsung Knox protects your phone from the minute it's turned on. Offering multi-layered security, it defends your most sensitive information from malware and malicious threats.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S10
products.summary:
Get €200 discount on Samsung Galaxy S10. The discount will apply in your basket. 
 
Screen: 6.1 inch Infinity screen featuring embedded 'Infinity O' camera

Battery life: Huge 3400mAh battery means you won't have to worry about your battery life

Camera: Breakthough triple camera system. Great low light photographs and Ultra HD 4K video recording.

Special feature: Wireless PowerShare allows charging of other compatible devices from the back of your phone
products.longDescription: Join Vodafone and get €200 off Samsung Galaxy S10. Only while stocks last. T&Cs apply.
fieldItems:
More than the eye can see

See more than the human eye with 123° ultra wide 16MP triple camera with f1.5 allowing for great low light photographs and Ultra HD 4K video recording.

Share the power

Welcome to the new era of power sharing. With Wireless PowerShare you can charge your friend's phones, your smart watch or Galaxy buds from the back of your phone.

To infinity and beyond

Virtually bezeless 6.1 inch infinity screen with embedded dual 'infinity O' camera in front screen for immersive media viewing and increased productivity

Sounds good?

Dual Dolby Atmos speakers tuned by AKG offer incredibly clear audio with virtual surround sound so you can surround yourself in rich stereo sound and lose yourself in a fully immersive experience.

Security underneath

Under screen Ultrasonic fingerprint reader makes sure that you can access your content and contacts quickly and easily but they are kept safe and secure to give you peace of mind.

Full of juice

The Samsung Galaxy S10's 3400mAh battery allows you to forget about worrying if you'll make it through the day and means you'll even have juice to share if your Galaxy buds need another charge.

products.title: Galaxy A50
products.name: Samsung Galaxy A50
products.summary:
Memory: 128GB with 4GB of RAM

Screen: 6.4 inch Infinity-U display covers the phone edge to edge.

Battery life: 4000mAh battery is one of the biggest available.

Camera: Brilliant rear mounted triple camera, for ultra wide shots with adjustable depth of field.

Special feature: Get the right shot at the right moment with built in Flaw Detection.
fieldItems:
The screen to see more of the world

Get closer to what matters to you on Galaxy A50 6.4-inch Infinity-U display. The display covers the phone edge to edge, for a phone that is nearly bezel-less. And with FHD+ resolution and Super AMOLED colour, you can dive deep into your favourite vlogs and livestreams.

Triple camera to capture your live moments

Galaxy A50 Triple camera consists of an Ultra Wide Camera with a 123-degree field of vision like the human eye, a 25MP (F1.7) camera for bright, clear photos all day, and a 5MP Depth Camera for adjusting depth of field.

Three ways to shoot

Three cameras to capture life as you go. Fit more of your world in the shot or capture moments in different lighting. Your day shots stay crisp, and your night shots pull in more light for less noise and sharp detail. You can even make your subjects stand out by playing with background blur.

Flaw Detection helps you fix your shots

Flaw Detection catches blinks, blurs, and backlighting and lets you know to try again. So you can get the right shot at the right moment.

Let your personality shine through

Now you have even more ways to express yourself. Make and personalise AR emojis to send to your friends to show how you feel. And play around with AR stickers, filters, and stamps for fun photos — no words needed.

Your fingerprint is the key

Galaxy A50 comes with high-tech biometric authentication. The On-Screen Fingerprint scanner recognises your unique fingerprint, so you are the only one who can press and unlock in one easy move.

products.title: Galaxy A20e
products.name: Samsung Galaxy A20e
products.summary:
Screen: 5.8 inch HD+ edge-to-edge infinity-V Display, you can see every inch of your content.

Battery life: 3000mAh battery gives you enough power to get through the day.

Camera: 13.00 MP Camera Dual camera allows for ultra wide angles and great shots. .

Special feature: Fast Charging lets you quickly get a boost and be on your way.
fieldItems:
The whole scene on your screen

With a 5.8 inch HD+ edge-to-edge infinity-V Display, you can see every inch of your content. It's the biggest 19.5:9 ratio display ever, letting you get lost in games and see even more of your favourite shows.

Dual camera to fit more in

The Galaxy A20e's Dual camera has a 13MP(F1.9) and a 5MP Ultra Wide Camera. With a 123-degree field of view like the human eye, it fits more in to every shot you take.

Smarter selfies

Make more of each selfie with a clever 8MP front camera. With Selfie focus, it†s able to blend the background and focus on your features. And Smart Beauty mode makes sure you†re always looking your best. 

Express yourself

Add stickers to your shots and use fun filters. The Galaxy A20e lets you show off your creative side.

Be in charge

Make sure that you’re in charge with a 3,000mAh (typical) battery. It’s able to last all day and has 15W Fast Charging, letting you quickly get a boost and be on your way.

Made to focus

One UI helps you focus on what really matters to you. Hardware and software work together, with content and features at your fingertips so you can get to them faster. Use Night Mode for a comfortable experience in the dark, and with clear and intuitive visuals using your phone is like second nature.

products.title: Galaxy A10
products.name: Samsung Galaxy A10
products.summary:
Screen: 6.2 inches of HD+ screen for a phone you'll love to watch.

Battery life: 3400mAh battery gives you enough power for up to 15 hours of 3G internet usage.

Camera: Take photos the way you want with the 13MP rear and 5MP front camera for picture-book snapshots.

Special feature: Galaxy A10 gives you personalized protection with face recognition technology.
fieldItems:
A screen with a better view

6.2 inches of HD+ screen for a phone you'll love to watch. Whether you're into sitcoms or MMORPGs, Galaxy A10's Infinity-V Display changes the way you experience them by putting you right in the action. See how far the experience takes you on the v-cut screen.

Simple design in living color

Galaxy A10"s slender 7.9 mm body feels like it's made for your hand. The glossy plastic finish stands out all on its own, and you can choose from black, blue, or red. Once it's in your grip, you'll never let go.

A camera to capture the moment

Take photos the way you want with the 13MP rear and 5MP front camera for picture-book snapshots. Your memories stay vivid, bright, and clear with the tap of a button. And the Octa Core processor makes everything run smoothly to keep up with how you live life.

Enjoy your photos to the fullest

A photo isn't just a photo with Galaxy A10. Decorate your memories with AR stickers, stamps, and filters to continue the fun even after you nail the shot.

Power for your everyday

Galaxy A10's 3,400 mAh battery is enough for your day-to-day. Whether you're the type to have texting marathons with your friends, watch livestream, or do what you love on a phone that lasts.

Look to unlock

Galaxy A10 gives you personalized protection with face recognition technology. It knows you, so you can simply hold the phone to your face for an easy, secure way to unlock and access. It's that simple.

products.title: Galaxy Note 9
products.name: Samsung Galaxy Note 9
products.summary:
• 6.4 inch WQHD display
  • 12MP (F1.5) dual aperture camera
  • 4000 mAh battery
fieldItems:
Rewrite the rules

The redesigned S Pen is unlike any other. Now Bluetooth enabled, use it to remotely take selfies from up to 10m away or as a presentation clicker. And when the inspiration strikes, scribble down ideas instantly thanks to the Screen Off Memo feature.

See beyond boundaries

Lose yourself in a large 6.4 inch infinity display with absolutely nothing to interrupt your view. If you’re into movie marathons or boxset binges, this screen was made for you. Plus, it’s easier to multi-task between tabs, split the screen or fully focus on important docs.

Shoot like a pro

The Galaxy Note doesn’t just capture, it sees. The intelligent Camera detects and adjusts to your surroundings, while Dual Aperture adapts to any lighting. Teamed with Flaw Detection to give you a heads up on blinking or blurring, you’ll shoot perfect pics day or night.

Charge ahead

With a battery that charges faster and lasts longer, the Galaxy Note9 is up for whatever you are. Whether you’ve got back to back meetings, or you’re heading off on an adventure without a socket in sight, the Galaxy Note9 won’t let you down.

products.title: iPhone 11 Pro
products.name: Apple iPhone 11 Pro
products.summary:
Battery life:  Up to 4 hours more battery life than the iPhone Xs with up to 50% charge in 30 minutes

Camera:  Triple camera system lets you zoom from the Telephoto all the way out to the new Ultra Wide camera, for an impressive 4x optical zoom range.

Memory / Storage:  64 or 256 GB means that you can have thousands of photo’s, videos, songs without impacting the performance of your phone.

Screen:  The toughest precision milled glass in any smartphone, front and back.
fieldItems:
And then there was Pro

A transformative triple‑camera system that adds tons of capability without complexity. An unprecedent­ed leap in battery life. And a mind‑blowing chip that elevates machine learning and pushes the boundaries of what a smartphone can do. Welcome to the first iPhone powerful enough to be called Pro.

Pro camera system - Three is the magic number

Meet the first triple-camera system to combine cutting-edge technology with the legendary simplicity of iPhone. Capture up to four times more scene. Get beautiful images in drastically lower light. Shoot the highest-quality video in a smartphone — then edit with the same tools you love for photos. You've never shot with anything like it.

And you thought your photos couldn’t get any better.

Next-generation Smart HDR uses advanced algorithms to finesse highlight and shadow detail in your image. And now it leverages machine learning to recognise faces in your shot and intelligently relight them. That means iPhone 11 Pro can automatically fine-tune detail in both the subject and the background. Even some DSLR cameras can’t do that.

Pro display - Super Retina XDR

A sharp contrast from everything else. The Super Retina XDR display boasts not one but two new peaks of brightness and understands when to use them. It hits up to 800 nits when you’re out in the sun — great for shooting and making selections on the go — and up to 1,200 nits when you’re viewing extreme dynamic range content. It’s like having a Pro Display XDR on your iPhone.

Why selfie when you can slofie?

The new 12MP TrueDepth camera lets you take super-fun slow-motion selfie videos at 120 fps, or shoot in 4K at 60 fps. For stills, the camera now automatically zooms out when you rotate your iPhone, so you can get all your friends in the shot. Yes, even selfies can be Pro.

Pro performance A chip so advanced, even we’re trying to catch up. The custom‑built A13 Bionic with a focus on machine learning across the entire chip — enabling experiences that simply aren’t found on any other smartphone. In fact, it’s so fast, so powerful and so intelligent, it’s years ahead of any other chip. Which gives you an unfair advantage.

Another hour of battery life would be great. Here’s five.

Our most dramatic leap in battery life ever. Up to 4 more hrs of battery life with iPhone 11 Pro. Up to 50% charge in around 30 minutes with fast charge. 

Creating tougher glass isn’t rocket science. It’s molecular science.

The toughest glass in any smartphone, front and back. Precision milled from a single sheet of glass. Dual ion-exchange process for added strength.

products.title: iPhone XS Max
products.name: Apple iPhone XS Max
products.summary:
Battery life:  Up to 1.5 hours longer than the iPhone X

Camera:  Breakthrough dual camera system

Memory / Storage:  64 GB means that you can have thousands of photo’s, videos, songs without impacting the performance of your phone.

Screen:  Solid apple durability years of continuous usage.
fieldItems:
Taken to the extreme

Super Retina in the largest display ever on an iPhone. Even faster Face ID. The smartest, most powerful chip in a smartphone. And a breakthrough dual-camera system. iPhone XS Max is everything you love about iPhone. Taken to the extreme.

Exceptional materials

The most durable glass ever in a smartphone. A beautiful new gold finish, achieved with an atomic-level process. Precision-machined, surgical-grade stainless steel bands. And a new level of water and dust resistance.

Advanced Face ID

Security is simple when your face is your password. You can unlock your iPhone, log in to apps and pay for things with a glance. It's the most secure facial authentication ever in a smartphone. And now it's even faster.

Intelligent A12 Bionic.

This is the smartest, most powerful chip in a smartphone, with Apple's next-generation Neural Engine. For amazing augmented reality experiences. Incredible portraits with Depth Control. And speed and fluidity in everything you do.

products.title: iPhone XR
products.name: Apple iPhone XR
products.summary:
• 6.1 inch Liquid Retina HD display
  • 12MP wide-angle camera
  • Splash, Water and Dust Resistant
fieldItems:
Introducing Liquid Retina

Introducing Liquid Retina. The new display on iPhone XR is the most advanced LCD in the industry. An innova­tive backlight design allows the screen to stretch into the corners. So you see true-to-life colour from one beautiful edge to the other.

Exceptional materials

The most durable front glass ever in a smartphone. Precision-machined, aerospace-grade aluminium bands. Water and dust resistance. And six stunning new finishes.

Advanced Face ID

Security is simple when your face is your password. You can unlock your iPhone, log in to apps and pay for things with a glance. It's the most secure facial authentication ever in a smartphone. And now it's even faster.

Intelligent A12 Bionic

This is the smartest, most powerful chip in a smartphone, with our next-generation Neural Engine. For amazing augmented reality experiences. Incredible portraits with Depth Control. And speed and fluidity in everything you do.

Breakthrough dual-camera system

The world's most popular camera is defining a new era of photography. Where an innovative sensor works with the ISP and Neural Engine to help you create photos like never before.

No other phone is like iPhone

Every decision that goes into iPhone makes it stand apart. From the way it's made, to the way we build in privacy and security from the start, to the innovative ways we recycle its components.

products.title: Apple iPhone 8
products.name: Apple iPhone 8
products.summary:
State of the art glass design, effortless wireless charging and a 4.7 inch Retina HD display.
  • 4.7 inch Retina HD display
  • 12MP camera with 5x digital zoom
  • A11 Bionic chip with 64-bit architecture
products.longDescription: Join Vodafone and get €150 off Apple iPhone 8. Only while stocks last. T&Cs apply.
fieldItems:
All-Glass Design
The most durable glass ever in a smartphone, front and back with a colour-matched, aerospace-grade aluminium band. iPhone 8 is precision-engineered at the microscopic level to protect against water, splashes, and dust.

More Capable Than Ever
iOS 11 is the world's most advanced mobile operating system and brings iPhone to life like never before, making every experience more powerful and personal.

All-New Display
A Retina HD display that's more beautiful than ever. With True Tone For a better viewing experience in all kinds of environments, a wide colour gamut, and 3D Touch.

All-New Sensor
iPhone 8 features a more advanced 12MP camera with a larger faster sensor, a new colour filter, deeper pixels and optical image stabilisation for photos and videos.

Faster CPU
Introducing A11 Bionic. With four efficiency cores that are up to 70 percent faster than A10 Fusion and two performance cores that are up to 25 percent faster.

products.title: Apple iPhone 7
products.name: Apple iPhone 7
products.summary: iPhone 7 dramatically improves the most important aspects of the iOS experience with an advanced new camera system and the most colourful display to date.
fieldItems:
Makes a splash. Takes a splash.
iPhone 7 reaches a new level of innovation and precision. The jet black finish is like nothing we've ever made. The enclosure is splash and water resistant. The Home button is completely re-engineered. And with a new unibody design that's seamless to the touch, iPhone 7 feels as amazing as it looks.

An entirely new camera enters the picture.
iPhone is the most popular camera in the world. Now we've re-engineered that beloved camera, adding optical image stabilisation, an f/1.8 aperture and a six-element lens to make it even better for shooting photos and videos in low light. And with advanced new features like wide colour capture, your photos and Live Photos will look even more vibrant.

The brightest, most colourful iPhone display yet.
Almost everything you experience with your iPhone comes to life on its display. It's where you look at the photos, messages and countless other things that make up your day. The iPhone 7 display uses the same colour space as the digital cinema industry, so what you see will be noticeably more brilliant and vibrant. Because we all deserve a bit more brightness in our day.

The most powerful chip ever in a smartphone.
iPhone 7 is supercharged by the most powerful chip ever in a smartphone. It's not just faster than any previous iPhone - it's also more efficient. That's because the A10 Fusion chip uses an all-new architecture that enables faster processing when you need it, and the ability to use even less power when you don't. And with the longest battery life ever in an iPhone, you can work at twice the speed of iPhone 6 and still enjoy more time between charges.

iPhone. Now in stereo.
For the first time, iPhone comes with stereo speakers, delivering two times the audio output of iPhone 6s and increased dynamic range. So whether you're listening to music, watching videos or making speakerphone calls, iPhone 7 lets you crank it up. Way, way up.

EarPods. With a Lightning connector.
iPhone 7 comes with EarPods that have a Lightning connector. But if you still want to listen through your old headphones, you can plug them in using a 3.5mm headphone jack adapter, also included.

Faster 4G LTE with the best worldwide roaming.
iPhone 7 features 4G LTE Advanced, with speeds up to 450 Mbps for data downloads - over 50 per cent faster than iPhone 6s and three times faster than iPhone 6. And thanks to even more LTE bands, you'll have the best worldwide roaming available in a smartphone. Happy travels.

iOS 10. It's why there's nothing else like an iPhone.
iOS 10 brings iPhone 7 to life in incredibly personal and powerful ways. The interface is beautiful and easy to use. Intelligent suggestions appear just when you need them. And advanced technologies protect your privacy and security.
